t.t-nocache: The wishlist depends on the user and must not be shared with other users. The product come from the controller.

t.t-value: product.website_ribbon_id.html_class and any(cls in ['o_ribbon_left','o_ribbon_right'] for cls in product.website_ribbon_id.html_class.split(' '))

span.t-attf-class: te_prod_label d-inline-block overflow-hidden position-relative #{product.website_ribbon_id.html_class if ribbon_cls else ''}
te_prod_label d-inline-block overflow-hidden position-relative #{product.website_ribbon_id.html_class if not (product.website_ribbon_id.bg_color and product.website_ribbon_id.text_color) else ' '}

p.placeholder: A short description that will also appear on documents.

xpath.attribute: (False if (website.b2b_hide_price and website.is_public_user()) else True) and (diff_price != 0)

ul.t-attf-class: list-inline list-unstyled o_wsale_product_attribute #{'d-none' if single_and_custom else ''} #{'te_style_round' if (ptal.attribute_id.icon_style == 'round') else 'te_style_square'} #{'large_item' if ptal.attribute_id.is_swatches else ''}

label.t-attf-class: css_attribute_color #{'active' if ptav in combination else ''} #{'custom_value' if ptav.is_custom else ''}

label.t-attf-style: background-color:#{ptav.html_color or ptav.product_attribute_value_id.name if not ptav.is_custom else ''}
label.t-attf-class: css_attribute_color #{'active' if ptav in combination else ''} #{'custom_value' if ptav.is_custom else ''}

span.t-attf-class: text-danger oe_default_price ms-1 h5 {{'' if combination_info['has_discounted_price'] and not combination_info['compare_list_price'] else 'd-none'}}

a.t-attf-class: btn btn-primary a-submit btn-md mt16 te_theme_button te_add_to_cart_sticky #{'w-100' if not buy_now_show else 'w-50'} #{'disabled' if product.remove_cart_button() else ' '}
btn btn-outline-primary btn-md mt16 d-block d-sm-inline-block o_we_buy_now te_buy_now_sticky te_theme_button w-50 #{'disabled' if product.remove_cart_button() else ' '}

div.class: d-flex align-items-start justify-content-center h-100 oe_unmovable mt-2
